item.title: Angels and Airwaves - Love
item.dc:creator: @XharveyX XharveyX
item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

Old Rsc Player:

Im not saying its for the money, or it should be for the money, but in order to live you need to make money, look what he did, he threw out some catchy riffs, made millions now releases music for free, the question is will the next blink 182 record be free?

I very much doubt it =/

Read full topic

item.title: Angels and Airwaves - Love
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:24, topic:331890”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=428272.msg3147473#msg3147473 date=1268212058]
Not catchy enough for me to warrant a “WOW” factor!

This is an example of song with “WOW” factor: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U0NHiZXpRVs

Only problem is that it’s shortened because the record company are a bunch of faggots, so alot of the solo is missing
[/quote]
That was quite good. Although the singing was a bit low so I couldn’t hear what they were saying.[/quote]Lyrics:

I’m gonna take you
To a place far from here
No one will see us
Watch the pain as it disappears
No time for anger
No time for despair
Won’t you come with me
There’s a room for us there
This innocent beauty
My words can’t describe
This rebirth purity
Brings a sullen tear right to your eyes
No time for anger
No time for despair
Please let me take you
'cause I’m already there

I’m so alone
My head’s my home
I’ll return to serenity

Rhyme without reason is why children cry
They see through the system
That’s breeding them just so they die
So please let me take you
And I’ll show you the truth
Inside my reality
We shared in youth

[CHORUS :]
I’m so alone
My head’s my home
And I feel
So alone
You know
At last
I’ll return to serenity

Now that I’ve taken you
To a place far from here
I really must go back
Close your eyes and we’ll disappear
Won’t you come with me
Salvation we’ll share
Inside of my head now
There’s a room for us there

Read full topic

item.title: Angels and Airwaves - Love
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:20, topic:331890”]Doing it why your drunk and high is another thing

Yea hes openly admitted it, but he can really really get down and play guitar. He may not seem like he can
because people are so use to hearing those easy catchy riffs, its just all a business strategy, what would sell more
catchy little rift and lyrics or hardcore guitar and lyrics? Catchy little rift makes cash.[/quote]If he’s only in it for the money he should kill himself. Music is primarily about feeling, expression and skill.

Ps: I guess that is why bands such as Iron Maiden, Metallica (shrugs), Slayer, Judas Priest, Testament, Sodom, Exodus, Helloween, Black Sabbath, Saxon etc have sold a ridiculous amount of records, some of them have even been frequent on radio in their primes.

Read full topic

item.title: Angels and Airwaves - Love
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“XharveyX, post:14, topic:331890”][quote author=c|p link=topic=428272.msg3146230#msg3146230 date=1268084404]

[quote author=XharveyX link=topic=428272.msg3145989#msg3145989 date=1268064050]we prefer inspirational music with people that can sing and play different things
[/quote]

did you really just

…
[/quote]
yeah i did, got a problem?

I wonder how there movie is gonna be…

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Love_(Angels_&_Airwaves_album)

The bands been making this movie for about 2 years now, its suppose to have a story line but based off there music as well.

I hope its good Im hoping the blinkumentary is good

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=428272.msg3146657#msg3146657 date=1268126933]

[quote author=XharveyX link=topic=428272.msg3146157#msg3146157 date=1268080191]

yeah well its only because the faggots of the internet only like screaming and shit and call it music whereas, i speak for me and old rsc player, we prefer inspirational music with people that can sing and play different things
[/quote]Funny seeing you say that when you listen to emo/screamo bullshit as well

do i?.. maybe some is ok but by tht i mean a few lines roared but look at my list of bands you’ll find not?
[/quote]Xcept that’s the worst kind of music. I love how you said “inspirational music” when most of ur shit is bland as fuck (note: i have not looked at band of this topic cus i am lazy).

Ps: i hate music with screaming, but i hate modern bs even more cus it is isolating bullshit.

lyrics are very inspirational imo, well your an old fag who needs to grow to like new music or is gonna get stuck. tbh i can imagine you to be the kinda guy everyone laughs at at school for some reason…[/quote]I like individual new bands, but 99% is shit.

Ps i love “inspirational” music, philosophical and political stuff especially. You should grow out of your modern little box and look back at the 70’s/80’s/early 90’s if you want real inspirational shit (this applies to most if not all genres from that period)

Cool a personal attack, thx i will be sure to take that into consideration for my future

Read full topic

item.title: Angels and Airwaves - Love

…[/quote]
yeah i did, got a problem?

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:11, topic:331890”]I wonder how there movie is gonna be…

en.wikipedia.org

Love (Angels & Airwaves album)

Love is the third studio album by alternative rock band Angels & Airwaves. It was released on February 12, 2010 on Fuel TV, and on February 14 on Modlife.[citation needed] The album was released free of charge due to "corporate underwriting". A "special edition" hard copy version of the album was scheduled for release on March 22, 2011, along with a second disc containing new music from the band. This was announced at a Q & A for the movie, which stated that it would be pushed back to Fall of On...

The bands been making this movie for about 2 years now, its suppose to have a story line but based off there music as well.[/quote]

I hope its good Im hoping the blinkumentary is good

[quote=“Speljohan, post:12, topic:331890”][quote author=XharveyX link=topic=428272.msg3146157#msg3146157 date=1268080191]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=428272.msg3146002#msg3146002 date=1268065004]

yeah well its only because the faggots of the internet only like screaming and shit and call it music whereas, i speak for me and old rsc player, we prefer inspirational music with people that can sing and play different things
[/quote]Funny seeing you say that when you listen to emo/screamo bullshit as well

do i?.. maybe some is ok but by tht i mean a few lines roared but look at my list of bands you’ll find not?
[/quote]Xcept that’s the worst kind of music. I love how you said “inspirational music” when most of ur shit is bland as fuck (note: i have not looked at band of this topic cus i am lazy).

Ps: i hate music with screaming, but i hate modern bs even more cus it is isolating bullshit.[/quote]

lyrics are very inspirational imo, well your an old fag who needs to grow to like new music or is gonna get stuck. tbh i can imagine you to be the kinda guy everyone laughs at at school for some reason…
